docs.summary: Create and manage Social Groups.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: groupId
params.doc: Group ID to add members to.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc: Site member IDs to add to group.

docs.summary:
Add site members to a specific group.
Group managers and group admins always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow site members to use this functionality as well.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Approves group requests.
Group managers have access to this functionality.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Approves pending join group requests.
Group managers always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow group members to use this functionality as well.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc: Group member IDs for this role.

docs.summary:
Assigns a specific group role to group members (relevant for existing group members only).
Can be used only by a group admin or a groups manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: creatorId
params.doc: Site member ID of group admin.

docs.summary:
Creates a group.
Group managers always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow site members to use this functionality as well.
Specify a `creatorId` to set the group's creator, who will be added as a group admin.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Deletes a group.
Group managers and group admins have access to this functionality.
The group will no longer be accessible in the live site or the Wix business manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Retrieves a group by ID.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: slug
params.doc: Slug (part of a group's URL, e.g., 'https:/example.com/groups/{slug}'). Pass only the slug. Case-sensitive.

docs.summary: Retrieves a group by slug.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 group members, given the provided paging.
Groups mangers can retrieve group members of any group.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Lists group requests across the site.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 groups across the site.
Groups managers can see all existing groups.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 join group requests, given the provided paging.
Group managers always have access to this functionality (site members can access their own join group requests in the site).

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 members and their membership status, given the provided paging.
Groups mangers can see all memberships for any group.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 group members, given the provided paging, sorting and filtering.
Groups mangers can retrieve group members of any group.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `role`

Supported fields for sorting:
- `joinedOn`

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of groups requests across the site.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `status`

Supported fields for sorting:
- `createdDate`

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 groups across a site.
Groups managers can see all groups.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `title`

Supported fields for sorting:
- `title`
- `createdDate`
- `membersCount`
- `recentActivityDate`

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 join group requests, given the provided paging and filtering.
Group managers always have access to this functionality (site members can access their own join group requests in the site).

Supported fields for filtering:
- `status`

No supported fields for sorting

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of up to 100 members and their membership status, given the provided paging and filtering.
Groups mangers can see all memberships for any group.

Supported fields for filtering:
- `role`
- `status`

No supported fields for sorting.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Rejects group requests.
Group managers have access to this functionality.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Rejects pending join group requests.
Group managers always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow group members to use this functionality as well.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: groupId
params.doc: Group ID to remove members from.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc: Site member IDs to remove from the group.

docs.summary:
Removes site members from a specific group.
Group managers and group admins have access to this functionality.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

params.name: siteMemberIds
params.doc: Group member IDs to unassign from this role.

docs.summary:
Unassigns a specific group role from group members (currently relevant only for group admins - members can't be unassigned).
Can be used only by a group admin or a groups manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary:
Updates a group.
Group managers and group admins have access to this functionality.

When `group.privacyLevel` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `PUBLIC`, all pending group join requests are automatically approved.

When `group.privacyLevel` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `SECRET`, all pending group join requests are automatically rejected.
Triggered when a groups manager approves a group request.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a groups manager rejects a group request.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a group is deleted.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered whenever a new group is created.

docs.summary: Triggered when an existing group is updated (see the payload for specific triggers).

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when an existing group's description is changed.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a join group request is approved by a group admin or a groups manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a join group request is rejected by a group admin or a groups manager.

permissions.name: Manage Social Groups
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and manage Wix groups.

docs.summary: Triggered when a new member is added to a group, either directly by an admin or when a join group request is approved.

{
  "id": "efe6d4f5-983f-46fb-9bfd-4e5f58ab7a4d",

  "slug": "created",
  "entityId": "de061872-745f-496d-9169-58d03b3b2684",
  "createdEvent": {"entityAsJson":   {
    "id": "de061872-745f-496d-9169-58d03b3b2684",
    "slug": "test-group",
    "privacyLevel": "PUBLIC",
    "title": "Test Group",
    "description": "Welcome to the group! You can connect with other members, get updates and share videos.",
    "details": {},
    "settings":     {
      "membersPermittedToInvite": true,
      "membersPermittedToApprove": false,
      "memberWelcomePostEnabled": true,
      "groupDetailsChangedPostEnabled": true,
      "showMemberList": true
    },
    "membersCount": 1,
    "createdBy":     {
      "id": "07eaad86-0c80-4432-a25a-d0403357bebd",
      "identityType": "MEMBER"
    },
    "createdDate": "2021-02-09T10:48:27Z",
    "recentActivityDate": "2021-02-09T10:48:27Z"
  }},
  "eventTime": "2021-02-09T10:48:29.699097Z",
  "triggeredByAnonymizeRequest": false
}

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: logo
members.doc: Group logo. You cannot upload your own logo.

members.name: membersPermittedToInvite
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to add/invite new group members to group with any privacy level. When `false`, member additions/invitations are limited to group admins. Defaults to true.

members.name: membersPermittedToApprove
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to approve join group requests. When `false`, member approval is limited to the group admins.

members.name: memberWelcomePostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a daily post about new members.

members.name: groupDetailsChangedPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a post when group details are changed.

members.name: showMemberList
members.doc: Whether all group members can view the group member list.

members.name: slug
members.doc: A unique part of a group's URL (e.g., 'https:/example.com/groups/slug').

members.name: privacyLevel
members.doc:
Group privacy level.
- `PUBLIC` - Anyone can see group in groups list and its content. Anyone can join group.
- `PRIVATE` - Anyone can see group in groups list, but only group members can see its content. In order to join group, a group join request should be submitted.
- `SECRET` - Only group members and a groups manager can see group in group list. New group members can only be added by other group members.

members.name: membersCount
members.doc: Total count of current group members.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was last updated.

members.name: recentActivityDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was last active (e.g., last post or comment).

docs.summary:
Site owners may choose to require that site members request approval when creating groups (available in the Wix Business Manager under Groups Application Settings).
When approval is required, only a groups manager can approve a request to create a new group.
When a group request is approved, the new group is added to the groups lists in the Wix UI.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of group request.
- `PENDING` - Pending group request.
- `APPROVED` - Approved group request.
- `REJECTED` - Rejected group request.
- `CANCELLED` - Cancelled group request.

members.name: siteMemberId
members.doc: Site Member ID of Group Member

members.name: joinedDate
members.doc: Date and time the group Member joined the group.

docs.summary:
To join a private group, a site member must submit a join group request, which can be approved or rejected by a group admin or a groups manager.
When a join group request is approved, the site member becomes a group member.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Join group request status.
- `PENDING` - Pending join group request.
- `APPROVED` - Approved join group request.
- `REJECTED` - Rejected join group request.
- `CANCELLED` - Cancelled join group request.

docs.summary: User provided answer to the question identified by question id.

A group member may have multiple roles in a single group.
Currently only `MEMBER` and `ADMIN` roles are supported, but more roles may be supported in the future.

members.name: value
members.doc:
Group member role
- `MEMBER` - Regular group member
- `ADMIN` - Group admin

members.name: role
members.doc: Role in group. Always has `UNKNOWN_ROLE` value in case membership is not 'JOINED'.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Membership status with Group
- `JOINED` - Site member is a group member.
- `PENDING` - Site member has join group request with `PENDING` status for this group.

members.name: role
members.doc: Group member role. When membership status is not `JOINED`, this is empty.

members.name: id
members.doc: Site member ID of the group creator.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member has joined.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member was added to.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member has left.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID that member was removed from.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID for which join request was approved.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID for which join request was rejected.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID for which join request was cancelled.

messages.name: _wix_social_groups_api_v2_RoleAssignedToGroupMember
messages.displayName: Role Assigned To Group Member Object

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID in which role was assigned.

members.name: groupMember
members.doc: Group member to whom the role was assigned.

members.name: assignedById
members.doc: ID of site member who assigned the role. It can be empty if the role was assigned by a third-party application.

messages.name: _wix_social_groups_api_v2_RoleUnassignedFromGroupMember
messages.displayName: Role Unassigned From Group Member Object

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID in which role was unassigned.

members.name: groupMember
members.doc: Group member from whom role was removed.

members.name: unassignedById
members.doc: ID of site member who unassigned the role. It can be empty if the role was assigned by a third-party application.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: A flag that indicates the server failed to calculate 'total' field

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: fields
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

members.name: membershipQuestionAnswers
members.doc: Answers to membership questions. They can be empty, but join group request will fail if answer to required question is omitted.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID to add members to.

members.name: siteMemberIds
members.doc: Site member IDs to add to group.

members.name: groupId
members.doc: Group ID to remove members from.

members.name: siteMemberIds
members.doc: Site member IDs to remove from the group.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Rejection reason. Free text that will be displayed to the creator of the rejected group request (max 1,000 characters).

members.name: siteMemberIds
members.doc: Group member IDs for this role.

members.name: siteMemberIds
members.doc: Group member IDs assigned to this role.

members.name: siteMemberIds
members.doc: Group member IDs to unassign from this role.

members.name: siteMemberIds
members.doc: Group member IDs unassigned from this role.

members.name: creatorId
members.doc: Site member ID of group admin.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATUS
  • PENDING - Pending group request.
  • APPROVED - Approved group request.
  • REJECTED - Rejected group request.
  • CANCELLED - Cancelled group request.

Possible values are:
  • BY_ID - Take into account only items which are listed in request.
  • ALL_ITEMS - Update all items.

Possible values are:
  • ALL - All items.
  • CURRENT_MEMBER - Items for current site member.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • PUBLIC - Anyone can see the group in the groups list and view its content. Anyone can join.
  • PRIVATE - Anyone can see the group in the groups list, but only group members can see its content. In order to join a group, a group join request must be submitted.
  • SECRET - Only group members and groups managers can see the group in the group list. New group members can only be added by existing group members.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_ROLE
  • MEMBER - Regular group member
  • ADMIN - Group admin

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_MEMBERSHIP
  • NONE - Site member is not a group member.
  • JOINED - Site member is group member.
  • PENDING - Site member has join request with PENDING status for this group.

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATUS
  • JOINED - Site member is a group member.
  • PENDING - Site member has join group request with `PENDING` status for this group.

Possible values are:
  • USER
  • MEMBER

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC
